text: Vom Ca-nhum (; born 1965) is a football manager and former player who is the head coach of the Chinese Taipei national team. ==Early life== Vom was born to a Taiwanese father and East Timorese mother. ==Career== In 2019, Vom was appointed manager of Shanxi Metropolis, becoming the first Taiwanese manager to coach a Chinese team. In February 2020, Vom was appointed as Chinese Taipei head coach, having been one of only a small number of coaches on the island with an AFC Pro A coaching license. In July 2020, Vom succeeded Toshiaki Imai as manager of Taiwan Football Premier League team Taichung Futuro. == References == Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Taiwanese footballers Category:East Timorese football managers Category:Taiwanese football managers Category:Association footballers not categorized by position Category:Shanxi Metropolis F.C. managers Category:Football managers in China
title: Vom Ca-nhum
